definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Sanjiaodai rubber production, sales zinc oxide, magnesium oxide, and other chemical raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 生產橡膠三角帶，銷售氧化鋅，氧化鎂等化工原料。

sentences.english: In the meantime, mixzinc oxide and oil of cloves into a white paste.
sentences.chinese: 同時，把氧化鋅和丁香油和成白色的膏。

sentences.english: Finally, the mechanism of pulse laser ablation for ZnO nanoparticles was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對氧化鋅納米顆粒的激光燒蝕機制進行了解釋。

sentences.english: Erbium doped ZnO has been prepared by vapor-phase transport process.
sentences.chinese: 鉺摻雜氧化鋅已經由氣相轉換的過程製備。

sentences.english: A new heterogeneous catalyst, i. e. lead-zinc double oxide has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 開發出一種新型高效氧化鉛一氧化鋅催化劑。

sentences.english: Zinc oxide powders have been successfully prepared via hydrothermal process.
sentences.chinese: 氧化鋅粉末已經通過水熱法成功製得。

sentences.english: In recent years, more and more nanostructure ZnO have been synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，愈來愈多奈米結構的氧化鋅被合成出來。

sentences.english: Alkaline leaching of Zn from zinc oxide ore from Lanping, Yunnan is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了雲南蘭坪氧化鋅礦石的鹼法浸出。

sentences.english: At 700C, ZnO nanostructures with tetrapod-like and wire-like morphologies were synthesized using thermal evaporation method.
sentences.chinese: 利用熱蒸發方法制得四角狀和線狀氧化鋅納米結構。

sentences.english: The tailing may be used as raw material to smelt zinc oxide by indigenous methods.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦可作爲土法冶煉氧化鋅的原料。

sentences.english: At present, the most commonly used are zinc oxide arrester .
sentences.chinese: 目前，使用最多的是氧化鋅避雷器。

sentences.english: Test of reducing slime of oxidized zinc ore by using stirring mill has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 採用攪拌磨對蘭坪氧化鋅礦石進行了磨礦試驗。

sentences.english: Excellent for feeding zinc oxide, polyethylene powder, and plastic pellets.
sentences.chinese: 該產品適合進料氧化鋅，聚乙烯粉，塑料顆粒。

sentences.english: Zinc oxide nanometer-sized powders were prepared by precipitation under ultrasonic radiation and precipitation methods, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分別採用超聲沉澱法和沉澱法製備了氧化鋅納米粉體。

sentences.english: Chargeability is a crucial parameter for the design of ZnO arrester.
sentences.chinese: 荷電率是設計氧化鋅避雷器的一項關鍵指標。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the stress effect on the near band gap emission of ZnO nanowires is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究了氧化鋅納米線中應力對帶邊發射的影響。
